data.reason: No candidate matches the proven WON Tier 1/Tier 2 patterns under current rules. AKT is closest to Tier 1 (RSI 55.7, gain +3.7%) but MACD is not clearly > signal (0.02/0.02), so it lacks bullish confirmation. CHZ is a Tier 2-style move (RSI 52.5 but gain +5.4%) with flat MACD (0.00/0.00), closer to the SOL and FET losing high-momentum setups. To mimic the POL/IRYS winning setups, we require clear MACD bullish confirmation plus clean Tier 1 or Tier 2 RSI/gain alignment, which is not present. Best action is to stay in cash and wait for a higher-quality setup.
